page.title: 12SHERE SCHOOL
page.content: In those days there were 130 children in the school aged from 5 to 14 years. These children all walked to school,and walked home to have their mid day meal. Today all the children stay at school for their midday meal which is brought by van from a local kitchen. The children all play together in the playground in 1985,in 1927 the playground was separated for boys and girls. We discovered that we still play games in the playground like Mr. & Mrs.Woods did when they were here, such as football,hopscotch and "The Big Ship Sails". In 1985 we have a climbing frame in the playground which is fairly recent but the large oak tree is still in the same place. Today the toilets are all indoors and the outside ones are demolished.
